data.name: AccordionHeader
data.value: What you need to know

data.name: AccordionBundleSubHeader
data.value: Bundles - important information

data.name: AccordionBundleSubHeaderAlt
data.value: Bundles – important information

data.name: DDHeader
data.value: Direct Debit discount

data.name: GreenDealHeader
data.value: Green Deal

data.name: GreenDealPara
data.value: If you have a Green Deal Scheme in place for your home, Green Deal charges will also apply. The estimates included in this application do not include Green Deal charges. We will write to you separately to confirm if a Green Deal charge applies.

data.name: NeedToKnowHeader
data.value: What you need to know before you apply

data.name: NeedToKnowPara2
data.value: We’ll send your Welcome pack by email. This includes your confirmation of contract, tariff information, terms and conditions and cancellation form.

data.name: NeedToKnowPara3
data.value: If we’re taking over the supply of energy from another supplier, you agree to your current supplier transferring the right for us to collect any debt you owe them (in the event we’re obliged to).

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader1Alt_Energy
data.value: Should I let my current supplier know I’m switching?

data.name: SwitchFAQAccordionHeader_Energy
data.value: Switching FAQs

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader1_Energy
data.value: Should I let my current supplier know I’m switching?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader1Para_Energy
data.value: Once you sign up, we’ll take care of everything including telling your current energy provider that you want to switch to us.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2_Energy
data.value: How long will my switch take?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2Para_Energy
data.value: We’re signed up to the Energy Switch Guarantee which means switching your gas and/or electricity will take no longer than 21 days.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader3_Energy
data.value: What happens when I switch?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader3Para_Energy
data.value: After you sign up, we’ll send your paperwork by email. Once your 14-day cooling off period has finished, we’ll ask your current energy supplier for your supply and begin your switch. Just before the switch is complete, we’ll ask you for your meter reading(s) and give these to your old supplier so they close your account on the same readings.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderPrePay4_Energy
data.value: What is the Pay As You Go price cap?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderPrePay4Para_Energy
data.value: Ofgem set a safeguard limit for Pay As You Go meters which reflects the cost of supplying energy. We set your actual energy prices, but must adhere to this price cap.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderPrePay5_Energy
data.value: I have a debt on my Pay As You Go meter – can I switch?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderPrePay5Para_Energy
data.value: You may be able to switch if your debt is less than £500. The Debt Assignment Protocol allows you to change supplier and take your debt with you. It isn’t guaranteed but it could be an option if you want to switch.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderNonPrePay4_Energy
data.value: What is a fixed price tariff?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderNonPrePay4Para_Energy
data.value: With a fixed price tariff your unit rate per kWh energy prices will stay the same over the period of your contract.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderNonPrePay5_Energy
data.value: What does ‘early exit fee’ mean?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderNonPrePay5Para_Energy
data.value: Some of our energy plans have ‘early exit fees’. We’ll charge you a certain amount if you switch to a different energy supplier or tariff before the end of your contract. These fees are ‘per fuel’ which means there’s one for gas and one for electricity. If you have both fuels (dual fuel) with us, we’ll charge for both. All our exit fees are clearly stated.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader6_Energy
data.value: Who are SSE?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader6Para_Energy
data.value: We first formed in 1998 when Scottish Hydro Electric merged with Southern Electric to become Scottish and Southern Energy. Later we incorporated SWALEC and Atlantic into our family and we’re now known as SSE. You may be familiar with our local brands – SSE Southern Electric, SSE Scottish Hydro and SSE SWALEC. But no matter what our name is, our primary aim is to give great customer service to our customers.

data.name: BroadbandBundleSavingsPara1
data.value: £180 saving is based on £10.00 (43%) discount for 18 months for fibre broadband (18 x £10.00 = £180), when compared to buying Unlimited Fibre, our equivalent standalone broadband product (£23).

data.name: BroadbandBundleSavingsSubHeader
data.value: How your savings are calculated

data.name: BroadbandBundleSavingsSubHeaderAlt
data.value: How your savings are calculated

data.name: AccordionEnergySubHeader
data.value: Energy tariffs - important information

data.name: AccordionEnergySubHeaderAlt
data.value: Energy tariffs – important information

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsHeader
data.value: Broadband & Phone details

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara1
data.value: Prices for broadband and phone products include 20% VAT. Your Bundle broadband and phone product has an 18-month fixed-term contract which begins on the day your service starts. The price displayed is the monthly cost of the broadband, phone line and optional call package for the duration of your contract (excluding additional calls and features).

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara2
data.value: After 18 months, your phone and broadband contract will roll onto a non-fixed-term contract. The current cost of this is £28 per month, but prices are subject to change. We’ll remind you before the end of your contract that your package price will change.

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara3
data.value: An early exit fee of 38 pence per remaining day of your contract applies if you cancel your service before the end of that term. For details about cancellation and early termination charges, see our full terms and conditions below.

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara4
data.value: Our broadband and phone packages are available to customers with an active BT Openreach phone line. If you don’t have one, we can install one for you. There's a one-off charge of £60 which we'll add to a future bill.

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara5
data.value: You can upgrade your broadband package at any time but this may terminate the discount earlier than 18 months. You can change your phone package at any time without affecting the discount you are receiving.

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara6
data.value: Our price promise is to keep phone and broadband package prices fixed for the duration of your contract from your package start date. The only exception will be any increases to VAT or any other relevant tax or levy. The monthly package price includes your monthly broadband, line rental and selected call package.

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara7_1
data.value: If you’re not happy with any aspect of the service you have received, and we have been unable to fix the problem, you can leave your contract without early termination charges within the first 60 days. For more details, see the

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara7_Link1Alt
data.value: Download the SSE 60-Day Broadband Happiness Guarantee

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara7_Link1Text
data.value: SSE 60-Day Broadband Happiness Guarantee

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_1
data.value: Broadband speed and unlimited downloads are subject to our

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_1Link1Alt
data.value: Download our Broadband Traffic Management Policy

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_1Link1Text
data.value: Broadband Traffic Management

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_1Link2Alt
data.value: Download our Acceptable Use Policy

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_1Link2Text
data.value: Acceptable Use

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_2
data.value: and

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_3
data.value: policies.

data.name: BundleBroadbandPhoneDetailsPara8_4
data.value: Actual speeds are dependent upon length and quality of the copper line between your home and your exchange or street cabinet as well as environmental factors within you home such as Wi-Fi interference, in-home wiring and congestion on the service you are accessing.

data.name: BundleFullTermsAndConditionsPara
data.value: For more details, please read our full terms and conditions below.

data.name: BundleEnergyDetailsHeader
data.value: Energy details

data.name: BundleEnergyDetailsPara1
data.value: Prices for energy products include 5% VAT. Bundle energy products have either a 12-month or an 18-month fixed-term contract that begins on the day your supply switches to us.

data.name: BundleEnergyDetailsPara2
data.value: After your fixed-term contract ends, we’ll move you onto our Standard variable tariff for energy, but we’ll contact you before that to let you know our latest tariffs.

data.name: BundleEnergyDetailsPara3
data.value: By signing up to this fixed price energy product, you are registering your interest for a smart meter. This means we may contact you in the future to discuss a smart meter installation as and when you become eligible. We rely on a mobile phone or wireless signal to get your smart meter readings. If these fail, you’ll either need to take your own reading and send it to us, or your bills will be estimated.

data.name: BundleEnergyDetailsPara4
data.value: If we’re taking over the supply of energy from another supplier, you agree to your current supplier transferring the right for us to collect any debt you owe them (in the event we’re obliged to).

data.name: BundleEnergyDetailsPara5
data.value: By choosing a fixed-term tariff and paying by Direct Debit, you’ll get a discount of £40 a year for each fuel compared to another way of paying. This discount is applied to your standing charge on a pence per day basis until your tariff ends. Discounts do not apply to customers on an Energy Assist tariff or with a Pay As You Go meter.

data.name: BundleEnergyDetailsPara6
data.value: If you have a Green Deal Scheme in place for your home, Green Deal Charges will also apply. The estimates included in this application do not include Green Deal Charges. We will write to you separately to confirm if a Green Deal Charge applies.

data.name: FullTermsAndConditionsPara
data.value: For further information about our tariffs, please read our terms and conditions below.

data.name: SSEHydroAlt
data.value: The SSE Hydro, Glasgow

data.name: AboutYourBundlePara1
data.value: Prices for broadband and phone products include 20% VAT.

data.name: AboutYourBundlePara2
data.value: Your Bundle broadband and phone product has an 18-month fixed-term contract which begins on the day your service starts. You may have to pay early termination charges if you cancel your service before the end of that term (see terms and conditions below).

data.name: AboutYourBundlePara3
data.value: After 18 months, your Phone and Broadband contract will roll onto a non-fixed-term contract. The current cost of this is {0} per month, but prices are subject to change. We’ll remind you before the end of your contract that your package price will change.

data.name: BeforeYouConfirmPara
data.value: Before you confirm your order, please read the full terms and conditions:

data.name: AboutYourSwitchHeader
data.value: About your switch

data.name: AboutYourSwitchPara1
data.value: We’ll contact your current provider to let them know you’re switching to us, unless you’re with Virgin Media. Virgin Media customers need contact the company directly to cancel their service.

data.name: AboutYourSwitchPara2
data.value: Switching takes around 18 to 20 days for most customers.

data.name: CallFeaturesHeader
data.value: Call features

data.name: CallFeaturesPara1_1
data.value: Any call features you have with your current provider may be transferred to us. These features are listed in the

data.name: CallFeaturesPara2
data.value: Please be aware that our call packages do not allow calls to be made to premium rate numbers beginning 09.

data.name: CancellationAndEarlyTermChargeHeader
data.value: Cancellation and early termination charges

data.name: CancellationAndEarlyTermChargePara1
data.value: The following charges may apply following cancellation of the broadband contract:

data.name: CancellationAndEarlyTermChargePara2
data.value: If you cancel your broadband order before your service start date, there will be no charge unless you have already received your router and you do not return this to us. When you notify us of your cancellation, we will send you a prepaid postage envelope for the return of the router. Should you not return your router within 30 working days an equipment charge of £54 will be added to your account.

data.name: CancellationAndEarlyTermChargePara3
data.value: For termination at any point between the broadband service start date and the end of month 18 of the contract, there is an early termination charge of 38 pence per remaining day of your fibre broadband contract. The maximum termination charge will be £208.80. This charge is not subject to VAT.

data.name: IfYouChangeYourMindHeader
data.value: If you change your mind

data.name: IfYouChangeYourMindPara1_1
data.value: You can cancel your contract without penalty within 14 days from the day after the date you sign up with us. We’ll include details of how to cancel when we send your confirmation of contract. Or you can get in touch using our

data.name: ContactUsLinkAlt
data.value: Contact us

data.name: ContactUsLinkText
data.value: Contact us

data.name: ContactUsLinkUrl
data.value: https://sse.co.uk/help/contact-us

data.name: IfYouChangeYourMindPara1_2
data.value: page.

data.name: PaperBillingHeader
data.value: Paper billing

data.name: PaperBillingPara1
data.value: Your account will have paperless billing as standard. If you’d like paper billing, you can choose this option on your online account. This will add a monthly charge of £2 to your broadband and phone bill.

data.name: SSEBroadbandHappinessHeader
data.value: SSE Broadband Happiness Guarantee

data.name: SSEBroadbandHappinessPara1
data.value: Customers signing up for SSE fixed-term broadband and phone package Bundles can leave their contract without early termination charges if, within the first 60 days, they are not happy with any aspect of the service they have received, and we have been unable to fix the problem.

data.name: SSEBroadbandHappinessPara1_Link1Text
data.value: Happiness Guarantee full details

data.value: Unlimited downloads

data.name: UnlimitedDownloadsPara1_1
data.value: Unlimited downloads are subject to our

data.name: YourLandlineNumberHeader
data.value: Your landline number

data.name: YourLandlineNumberPara1
data.value: We’ll look to move your landline number across to us, if you’ve asked us to do so. If we can’t do this, we’ll give you a new phone number. If you haven’t given us a landline number, or don’t have one, we’ll give you a new one. We’ll tell you what your number is once you’re set up.

data.name: AboutYourBundleEnergyPara3
data.value: We’ll send your Welcome pack by email. This includes your confirmation of contract, tariff information, terms and conditions and cancellation form.

data.name: CallFeaturesPara1_2
data.value: , and some will involve an ongoing monthly charge. If you’d like to add or change any of these call features, please get in touch after your phone service starts.

data.name: SwitchFAQAccordionHeader_Bundle
data.value: Bundle FAQs

data.name: SwitchFAQAccordionSubHeader1Alt_Bundle
data.value: I’m already an SSE customer. Can I get a Bundle?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader1Para_Bundle
data.value: Yes, our Bundles are available to new and existing SSE customers, as long as you pay by Direct Debit.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader1_Bundle
data.value: I’m already an SSE customer. Can I get a Bundle?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2Alt_Bundle
data.value: How long will it take to switch my utilities?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2Para_Bundle_1
data.value: We’re signed up to the Energy Switch Guarantee, so we’ll make sure we switch your gas and/or electricity supply within 21 days.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2_Bundle
data.value: How long will it take to switch my utilities?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader3Alt_Bundle
data.value: Should I let my utilities providers know that I’m switching?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader3Para_Bundle_1
data.value: No need to tell your current energy, broadband or phone providers you’re switching to us – we’ll do that for you, unless you’re with Virgin Media. If you’re a Virgin Media customer, you’ll have to contact them directly to cancel your broadband and phone service.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader3_Bundle
data.value: Should I let my utilities providers know that I’m switching?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader4Alt_Bundle
data.value: What happens when I sign up for a Bundle?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader4Para_Bundle_1
data.value: After you sign up, we’ll send you Welcome packs with full details about your products.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader4_Bundle
data.value: What happens when I sign up for a Bundle?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader5Alt_Bundle
data.value: Do Bundles have a minimum term contract?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader5Para_Bundle_1
data.value: Yes, all the products in our Bundles have 12-month or 18-month fixed-term contracts.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader5_Bundle
data.value: Do Bundles have a minimum term contract?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader6Alt_Bundle
data.value: What happens when my Bundle ends?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader6Para_Bundle_1
data.value: You’ll pay the Bundle price for each product until your fixed-term contracts end.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader6_Bundle
data.value: What happens when my Bundle ends?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader7Alt_Bundle
data.value: What is a fixed price tariff?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader7Para_Bundle
data.value: With a fixed price tariff your unit rate per kWh energy prices will stay the same over the period of your contract.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader7_Bundle
data.value: What is a fixed price tariff?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2Para_Bundle_2
data.value: Switching your broadband and phone takes around 18 to 20 days.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader4Para_Bundle_2
data.value: Just before we switch your gas and/or electricity supply to us, we’ll ask you for your meter readings and give these to your old supplier so they can close your account.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader4Para_Bundle_3
data.value: If your Bundle includes broadband and phone, we’ll let you know if you need an engineer to visit. Then we’ll post you a wireless broadband router. Plug it in on the day of the switch – you’re connected and ready to go!

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader5Para_Bundle_2
data.value: You may have to pay termination charges if you cancel a contract before the end of the term. We’ll explain the terms and conditions for each product before you sign up.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader6Para_Bundle_2
data.value: At the end of your contract, we’ll move you onto our Standard variable tariff for energy. But we’ll contact you before that to let you know our latest tariffs so you can review your options.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader6Para_Bundle_3
data.value: For broadband and phone and boiler and heating products, you’ll pay the standard monthly price after your fixed-term contract ends. We’ll remind you about this price change before the end of your contract.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2Alt_Energy
data.value: How long will my switch take?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader3Alt_Energy
data.value: What happens when I switch?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderPrePay4Alt_Energy
data.value: What is the Pay As You Go price cap?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeaderPrePay5Alt_Energy
data.value: I have a debt on my Pay As You Go meter – can I switch?

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader2Para_Bundle_3
data.value: Boiler and heating products and Electrical Wiring Cover start on the next working day after your energy supply switches to us.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader3Para_Bundle_2
data.value: If your Bundle includes a boiler and heating product or Electrical Wiring Cover and you currently have a similar product with another provider, you’ll need to contact them to cancel it.

data.name: SwitchFAQSubHeader4Para_Bundle_4
data.value: For boiler and heating products and Electrical Wiring Cover, your 24/7 cover will start on the next working day after your energy supply switches to us.

data.name: BundleHeatingBreakdownDetailsHeader
data.value: Heating Breakdown details

data.name: BundleHeatingBreakdownDetailsPara1
data.value: The price for Heating Breakdown includes 20% VAT and Insurance Premium Tax. Heating Breakdown has a 12-month fixed-term contract which begins on the next working day after your energy supply switches to us.

data.name: BundleHeatingBreakdownDetailsPara2
data.value: We’ll write to you at least 14 days before your 12-month contract ends. We’ll let you know your new price before we renew your cover for a further 12 months. You’ll then be able to change your level of cover or cancel your renewal, as you wish.

data.name: BundleHeatingBreakdownDetailsPara3
data.value: Your cover has a £90 excess, which means you'd pay £90 each time you need to make a claim.

data.name: BundleHeatingBreakdownDetailsPara4_1
data.value: Parts and labour are subject to terms and conditions found in the

data.name: BundleHeatingBreakdownDetailsPara5
data.value: This policy is for owners of domestic properties only. Retail, commercial and other premises used for business are not eligible.

data.name: AboutYourBundlePara4
data.value: We’ll send you a Welcome pack by email with full details about your product.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara1
data.value: The price for Heating Breakdown includes 20% VAT and Insurance Premium Tax.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara1_FixNProtectPlus
data.value: The price for Heating Cover includes 20% VAT and Insurance Premium Tax.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara2
data.value: Heating Breakdown has a 12-month fixed-term contract which begins on the next working day after your energy supply switches to us.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara2_FixNProtectPlus
data.value: Heating Cover has a 12-month fixed-term contract which begins on the next working day after your energy supply switches to us.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara3
data.value: We’ll write to you at least 14 days before your 12-month contract ends. We’ll let you know your new price before we renew your cover for a further 12 months. You’ll then be able to change your level of cover or cancel your renewal, as you wish.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara4
data.value: We’ll send you a Welcome pack by post with full details about your product, including your Confirmation of Sale letter.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara4_FixNProtectPlus
data.value: You’ll be contacted to arrange an initial system inspection.

data.name: AboutYourHomeServicesBundlePara5
data.value: Before you confirm your order, please read the full terms and conditions:

data.name: AreYouEligibleForHomeServicesPara1
data.value: This policy is for owners of domestic properties only. Retail, commercial and other premises used for business are not eligible.

data.name: AreYouEligibleForHomeServicesPara2
data.value: If you are protecting the boiler at your property it must have a power output of less than 70 kW/hr and be powered by natural gas. Boilers powered by liquified petroleum gas (LPG), oil, renewable heat sources and electric are not covered.

data.name: AreYouEligibleForHomeServicesPara3
data.value: We do not cover any models for the following brands of boiler: Servowarm, Chaffoteaux or Ferroli. Additionally, we do not cover the Ideal Istor boiler or any thermal store products made by Gledhill.

data.name: AreYouEligibleForHomeServicesPara4
data.value: Boilers with long-term and obvious pre-existing faults or system deficiencies, as determined by our engineer acting reasonably, are not covered.

data.name: IfYouChangeYourMindPara1
data.value: You can cancel your contract without penalty within 14 days from the day you receive your Welcome pack. If we have carried out any works or you have made a claim in this 14-day cancellation period, you will be responsible for the cost incurred.

data.name: IfYouChangeYourMindPara2
data.value: You may also cancel this cover at any time after the cancellation period, but you will be responsible to pay us for any cover provided and any fees incurred.

data.name: IfYouChangeYourMindPara3
data.value: We’ll include details of how to cancel when we send your confirmation of contract. Or you can get in touch using our Contact us page.

data.name: SmartMeter2
data.value: If you sign up to one of our other fixed price tariffs, you are registering your interest for a smart meter. This means we may contact you in the future to discuss a smart meter installation as and when you become eligible.

data.name: SmartMeter3
data.value: We rely on a mobile phone or wireless signal to receive your readings. If these fail, your bills will be estimated.

data.name: BundleSmartMeter1

data.name: BundleSmartMeter2
data.value: We rely on a mobile phone or wireless signal to get your smart meter readings. If these fail, you’ll either need to take your own reading and send it to us, or your bills will be estimated.

data.name: AccordionSavingsCalculationPara1

data.name: ImportantInformationElecWiringInspHeader
data.value: Electrical Wiring Inspection

data.name: ImportantInformationElecWiringInspPara1
data.value: Electrical Wiring Cover covers your home's fixed electrical wiring system. "Fixed electrical wiring system" means your electrical wiring, fuse box, light fittings and switches, wall sockets and shower isolation switches. We may need to do an initial visual inspection of your fixed electrical wiring system and an earth loop impedance test. This may be necessary if your house is over 15 years old, hasn't been rewired in the last 15 years or has an old-style fuse box.

data.name: ImportantInformationElecWiringInspPara2
data.value: For more details, please read the insurance product information document:

data.name: OVODisclaimerText
data.value: SSE is now part of the OVO family, which means some of your communications may say SSE Home Services and some may mention OVO (S) Home Services. This will not negatively impact the product or service that you will receive. Please bear with us as we update all of our communications accordingly.
